name: SplitPropertiesGaugeOptions

properties.name: splitLineColor
properties.description: Color of the split lines (used only in the custom preset)
properties.rawdescription: Color of the split lines (used only in the custom preset)

properties.name: splitLineDistance
properties.description: Distance between the split line and axis line
properties.rawdescription: Distance between the split line and axis line

properties.name: splitLineDistanceRatio
properties.description: Distance between the split line and axis line as a ratio relative to the axisLineWidth (overrides splitLineDistance)
properties.rawdescription: Distance between the split line and axis line as a ratio relative to the axisLineWidth (overrides splitLineDistance)

properties.name: splitLineLength
properties.description: Length of the split line, can be a percentage value relative to radius
properties.rawdescription: Length of the split line, can be a percentage value relative to radius

properties.name: splitLineLengthRatio
properties.description: Length of the split line as a ratio relative to the axisLineWidth (overrides splitLineLength)
properties.rawdescription: Length of the split line as a ratio relative to the axisLineWidth (overrides splitLineLength)

properties.name: splitNumber
properties.rawdescription: Number of segments in the gauge

description: Properties related to the split lines of the gauge
rawdescription: Properties related to the split lines of the gauge
